name: Chefs' Warehouse, Inc.
description: Chefs' Warehouse, Inc. is a premier distributor of specialty food products in the United States and Canada, serving thousands of chefs and foodservice operators across the culinary spectrum. Founded in 1985, the company has built a strong reputation for delivering high-quality products, including fresh produce, gourmet meats, seafood, cheese, and a wide array of specialty items. With a focus on supporting chefs and enhancing culinary creativity, Chefs' Warehouse partners with local farms and artisans to source the finest ingredients while also offering imports from renowned international suppliers. The company operates through a network of distribution centers and branches, ensuring timely delivery and exceptional customer service. By leveraging technology and a robust logistics infrastructure, Chefs' Warehouse maintains its position as an industry leader in the specialty food distribution sector. Committed to sustainability and supporting local economies, the company emphasizes ethical sourcing practices and actively seeks to reduce its environmental footprint. Chefs' Warehouse's dedication to quality, service, and innovation continues to drive its growth and strengthen its relationships with culinary professionals.

seo.meta_title: Chefs' Warehouse, Inc. | Specialty Food Distribution
seo.meta_description: Explore Chefs' Warehouse, Inc., a leading distributor of specialty food products committed to quality and service. Discover our wide range of gourmet ingredients.

faq.question: What does Chefs' Warehouse do?
faq.answer: Chefs' Warehouse is a distributor of specialty food products, serving chefs and foodservice operators.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Chefs' Warehouse?
faq.answer: Christopher P. Pappas is the CEO of Chefs' Warehouse, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Chefs' Warehouse headquartered?
faq.answer: Chefs' Warehouse is headquartered in Ridgefield, Connecticut, USA.

faq.question: What types of products does Chefs' Warehouse offer?
faq.answer: Chefs' Warehouse offers fresh produce, meats, seafood, dairy, and specialty items.
